summary: Iteration 11 testing for Forgot Password feature. Backend API tests: 9/9 passed (100%). Frontend UI tests: All critical flows working. The password reset feature is fully functional - forgot password form submits correctly, reset password page loads with token, form validation works (8 char min, password match), and invalid/expired tokens are properly rejected.
passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/auth/forgot-password for existing user returns success
Backend: POST /api/auth/forgot-password for non-existent user returns same message (security)
Backend: POST /api/auth/forgot-password with invalid email format returns 422
Backend: POST /api/auth/reset-password with invalid token returns 400
Backend: POST /api/auth/reset-password with short password (<8 chars) returns 400
Backend: POST /api/auth/forgot-password for Google OAuth user handled gracefully
Backend: Full password reset flow with valid token works
Backend: Expired tokens are rejected with appropriate error
Backend: Token is deleted after successful use (single-use)
Frontend: Login page shows 'Forgot password?' link with data-testid='forgot-password-link'
Frontend: Clicking forgot password link shows reset form
Frontend: Forgot password form has email input (data-testid='forgot-email')
Frontend: Forgot password form has submit button (data-testid='forgot-submit')
Frontend: Empty email validation shows error toast
Frontend: Successful submission shows 'Check your inbox' confirmation
Frontend: Reset password page loads at /reset-password?token=xxx
Frontend: Reset password page has new password input (data-testid='new-password-input')
Frontend: Reset password page has confirm password input (data-testid='confirm-password-input')
Frontend: Reset password page has submit button (data-testid='reset-password-btn')
Frontend: Password mismatch validation shows error toast
Frontend: Invalid token shows 'Invalid or expired reset link' error
Frontend: Reset password page without token redirects to landing with error
critical_code_review_comments: Password reset implementation follows security best practices - doesn't reveal if email exists
Token expiration (1 hour) is appropriate for password reset
Tokens are properly deleted after use (single-use)
Frontend validation matches backend requirements (8 char min, password match)
Reset password page properly handles missing token by redirecting to landing
Email service uses Resend API with branded HTML template
seed_data_creation: Used existing test user fresh@blvx.app. Created temporary reset tokens in MongoDB for testing.

mocked_apis.notes: Using real Resend API for email sending. No mocked APIs.

context_for_next_testing_agent: Forgot Password feature is fully functional. Frontend pages: LandingPage.jsx has forgot password form (authMode='forgot'), ResetPasswordPage.jsx handles /reset-password?token=xxx route. Email service uses Resend API with branded HTML templates.
